page.title: 14Looking After Animals
page.content: A Dog: My Great Dane will need a walk every morning,and a bowl of water.Most of the day she will lie in the sun. After school she always has to have another walk then some food.For her meal she eats a whole tin of dog food and one a half saucepans of dog biscuits. A Pony: I go and meet my pony everyday I take him out for a ride and groom him before and after the ride.I would take his food up and check that he has clean fresh water everyday I would also spray him with fly spray in the summer.I would try and be with him all my spare time. A Cat: My cat gets fed in the morning with Gocats with milk. At 5 o,clock in the afternoon she has kitekat meat plus milk.Some days she stays inside all day asleep but others she goes outside in the sun or shade.
